CheckTitle: Checks for OpenNebula templates based on outdated operating systems or images
Description: This check identifies OpenNebula VM templates that are based on operating systems or images that are no longer supported or maintained.
Risk: Using outdated operating systems exposes instances to known vulnerabilities and lack of security patches, increasing the risk of compromise.

Recommendation.Text: Update templates to use supported and maintained operating systems and images. Replace legacy templates with newer versions.

Notes: Operating system end-of-life (EOL) means no security updates are available, critically affecting the security posture of the environment.
